channel.title: Remote OK - Remote Jobs
channel.description: Remote jobs for developers, designers and more

item.title: TestCorp: Senior Full Stack Developer
item.description:
We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer to join our team.

Requirements:

  • 5+ years experience with C# and .NET
  • Experience with React
  • Strong problem-solving skills

Salary: $80,000 - $120,000

item.title: DevHouse: Backend Python Engineer
item.description:
Join our backend team working on microservices.

Requirements:

  • 3+ years Python experience
  • Experience with Django or FastAPI
  • Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes

item.title: Frontend Masters: React Developer
item.description:
We're hiring a React Developer for our web application.

Tech Stack: React, TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS

Salary: $60,000 - $90,000
